courses.entryRequirements: Non-Chinese citizen; age ~18–25; high-school (SMA/SMU) diploma or equivalent (original or notarized copy); academic transcripts; two recommendation letters; personal statement; passport; meet one accepted standardized route (SAT ≥1400 OR IB/A-Level/ACT meeting PKU thresholds) or pass PKU secondary assessment; Chinese-taught tracks typically require HSK6 (≥210). Indonesian applicants should provide notarized SMA diploma/transcripts and passport copy, plus any SAT/IB/A-Level results if available.
